item.title: CVE-2021-22255|2024-08-03T18:37:18.499Z -- baserow%20b.v. -- baserow
item.description: SSRF in URL file upload in Baserow <1.1.0 allows remote authenticated users to retrieve files from the internal server network exposed over HTTP by inserting an internal address.
